website_summaries.verdict: While the battery is a concern, the Xperia Z2 Tablet is still a good-looking slate that's loaded with more than enough power for anything you're likely to throw at it. It's a good choice if you're looking for a more affordable iPad alternative with 4G LTE -- particularly if you've ever lost a gadget through water damage.
pros: The Sony Xperia Z2 Tablet's processor is searingly powerful and copes well with games
It has a bright, vivid display and its razor-thin body can be taken in the shower without worry
cons: It loses its battery far too quickly in standby mode
Huge bezels around the display don't look good and make the body needlessly big, and its slim design has resulted in the whole thing being a little flexible

Sometimes overly sensitive and sometimes unresponsive, it makes using the tablet a wearisome experience. Try using the on-screen keyboard and you'll find letters repeat or aren't registered at all, meaning you have to watch for every keystroke - touch typing becomes impossible. Maybe this problem is limited to a certain production run but's seems I'm not alone with my experience, see:  I ended up returning the tablet for a refund. A real shame as everything else about it was spot-on.
customer_reviews.author: David Orme

customer_reviews.title: using it and love it
customer_reviews.text: Bought for almost two weeks and very satisfied. The screen is perfect either for videos or images. Wifi Internet connection is also fast and stayble. Battery power is strong enough for me since I only have to charge this thing approximately once in 48 hours (and I consider myself as a heavy user of this electronic device). Sound output for headphones is great as usual. Android system is comfortable to use. 800megaPixel camera is enough since it will look stupid (no offence) to use a tablet as a professional camera. It is my first tablet, so no comparison can be made. But I think it worth the price.

customer_reviews.text: This tablet is ridiculously good in both speed and quality. I have had it only a day but I can't stop wanting to pick it up and play around with it. That may seem like an arbitrary compliment, but sometimes products just have a certain "je ne sais quoi" about it, be it form factor or something with the build that just feels right. customer_reviews.title: Sony Xperia Z2 Tablet
customer_reviews.text: Could not be happier with this tablet. I am a college graduate student and use this everyday. I never realized how much simpler it is to bring a tablet instead of your laptop. The screen is absolutely stunning as it makes my laptop screen look dim in comparison. I have it on max brightness and get a couple days of good use on a single charge. This tablet is ridiculously thin, super light, waterproof, and feels very comfortable in landscape mode. It is what you would come to expect from Sony build quality. I recommend buying from the Sony online store as you will get the magnetic charging dock for free. Highly recommended tablet!
